  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.rapla.gui.ReservationCheck
    use EventCheck instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.rapla.components.util.CommandQueue
    use CommandScheduler instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Permission.GROUP_CAN_CREATE_EVENTS
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Permission.GROUP_CAN_EDIT_TEMPLATES
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Permission.GROUP_CAN_READ_EVENTS_FROM_OTHERS
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Permission.GROUP_MODIFY_PREFERENCES_KEY
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Permission.GROUP_REGISTERER_KEY
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.rapla.framework.Container.addContainerProvidedComponent(Class<T>, Class<I>, Configuration)
    use system preferences to store config instead
    org.rapla.framework.Container.addContainerProvidedComponent(TypedComponentRole<T>, Class<I>, Configuration)
    use system preferences to store config instead. Use addResourceFile for language resources
    org.rapla.gui.RaplaGUIComponent.createAppointmentAction(Component, Point)
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.formatTimestamp(Date, TimeZone)
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.fromRaplaTime(TimeZone, Date)
    moved to TimeZoneConverter
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.fromRaplaTime(TimeZone, long)
    moved to TimeZoneConverter
    org.rapla.facade.QueryModule.getAllocatableBindings(Appointment)
    use QueryModule.getAllocatableBindings(Collection,Collection) instead
    org.rapla.entities.dynamictype.DynamicType.getElementKey()
    use getKey instead
    org.rapla.entities.User.getGroups()
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.getImportExportTimeZone()
    moved to TimeZoneConverter
    org.rapla.entities.Timestamp.getLastChangeTime()
    use getLastChanged instead
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Permission.AccessLevel.getNumericLevel()
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Allocatable.getPermissions()
    use getPermissionList instead
    org.rapla.facade.RaplaComponent.getPluginConfig(String)
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.getSystemTimeZone()
    only used internally by the storage api
    org.rapla.facade.RaplaComponent.getWebservice(Class<T>)
    demand webservice in constructor instead
    org.rapla.facade.CalendarOptions.getWorktimeEnd()
    use CalendarOptions.getWorktimeEndMinutes() instead
    org.rapla.facade.CalendarOptions.getWorktimeStart()
    use CalendarOptions.getWorktimeStartMinutes() instead
    org.rapla.entities.domain.Allocatable.isHoldBackConflicts()
    use getAnnotation(IGNORE_CONFLICTS) instead
    org.rapla.entities.Entity.isPersistant()
    as of rapla 1.8 there can be multiple persistant versions of an object. You can still use isReadOnly to test if the object is editable returns if the instance of the entity is persisant and the cache or just a local copy. Persistant objects are usably not editable and are updated in a multiuser system. Persistant instances with the same id should therefore have the same content and persistant1.isIdentical(persistant2) implies persistant1 == persistant2. A non persistant instance has never the same reference as the persistant entity with the same id. persistant1.isIdentical(nonPersitant1) implies persistant1 != nonPersistant2. As
    org.rapla.framework.Container.lookup(Class<T>, String)
    will be removed in 2.0 use TypedComponenteRole instead
    org.rapla.facade.ModificationModule.newAppointment(Date, Date, RepeatingType, int)
    use newAppointment and change the repeating type of the appointment afterwards
    org.rapla.entities.domain.PermissionContainer.Util.processOldPermissionModify(Classifiable, Classifiable) 
    org.rapla.entities.dynamictype.DynamicType.setElementKey(String)
    use setKey instead
    org.rapla.entities.MultiLanguageName.setNameWithoutReadCheck(String, String)
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.toDate(int, int, int)
    use toRaplaDate
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.toRaplaTime(TimeZone, Date)
    moved to TimeZoneConverter
    org.rapla.framework.RaplaLocale.toRaplaTime(TimeZone, long)
    moved to TimeZoneConverter
